title: What Fluctuations In Currency Mean For Car Interiors
teaser: Big fluctuations in currency — the dollar's up, the euro and yen are down — can seem abstract and meaningful only to traders and multinational corporations. But they have a tangible impact on where jobs are created and even the interiors of the cars we drive.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
